top_comments.comment: I'd love to win this bottle, I've sampled adg profumo in the past and it smells great, would be nice to add this to my collection. As always thanks for the giveaway ash

comments_since_last_sample.body: Hey Ash!! I would love to be entered – thank you! I definitely used to roll with the OG ADG when I was in my early 20s; I’d love to revisit it! Thanks
I have never tried the original Aqua Di Gio, only the super-hyped Profumo. I liked the Profumo, but I feel like a fresher version would be awesome to win!
I have never owned the original ADG. I heard it was very popular back in the day and I’m curious as to why it is one of the best selling fragrances!
I’m a John Varvatos fan, but Artisan Black was a whiff for sure.
Love your videos man! I’ve never had Aqua Di Gio would love to get my sniff machine on that! Take care!
I never rocked Acqua Di Gio. I don't one it
I never rocked Acqua Di Gio. I don't one it
I'd love to win this bottle, I've sampled adg profumo in the past and it smells great, would be nice to add this to my collection. As always thanks for the giveaway ash
I never rocked it. I don't one it

Video sponsored by Giorgio Armani,ok great.
Acqua de Gio giveaway,wow fantastic.
Now you saying  thats your all time favorite in terms of compliments...now thats such a joke for people who being in this channel for years.
But we get it...get the check.
I never rocked Acqua Di Gio. I don't one it
I never rocked Acqua Di Gio. I don't one it
Hey ash. Honestly I haven't had a bottle of acqua di gio nor any of its flankers. Hoping to get the prize!
Once I Had a little 5ml decant and man this scent is fenomenal. So i will gladly take a full bottle
I love Aqua di gio, im 21 and it's a signature scent of mine and it's probably my most complimented as well. I would love to win it!

Just started collecting , up to 30+ bottles but surprisingly don’t have an Armani . I have sniffed ODG at the counters but for some reason or another wanted a different fragrance in my collection at those times . 

I will get ADG eventually because I like the DNA from some of it’s clones or alternatives like PE Red 360 .   Wouldn’t mind winning a Giveaway though .   This is quite the expensive hobby .  

Btw : appreciate your videos and opinions . Like your dry and humble self directed humor
I only wore clones  of ADG and they still rocked it
I have used new flankers of Aqua di Gio Profumo and Profundo, but never got a chance to rock The Originial yet. I would like to get a chance to use it with other Aqua di Gio's.

It is still one of the best owned it when it came out and moved from their. Besides hero and cool water it is on fragrance that started getting me into trying others. Would love to kick it back to early 2000
I have never tried it! This will make a nice addition to my AdG collection.
